active.name: Main Interactive Behaviors
active.description: Core interactive features: navigation, scrolling, forms, animations

active.name: Ad Engine
active.description: Ad slot management and monetization

active.name: Runtime Media Engine
active.description: Media validation, repair, and fallback management

active.name: Runtime Data Engine
active.description: JSON config loading, RSS feeds, caching, auto-refresh

active.name: Runtime Ads & Scripts
active.description: Safe ad execution and rotation

active.name: Runtime JS Execution Engine
active.description: Executes discovered JS with failsafe error handling

active.name: Runtime UI Rendering
active.description: Auto-loads CSS files and manages UI styling

active.name: Runtime Core Orchestrator
active.description: Master orchestrator for all engines and files

active.name: Runtime Error Autofix
active.description: Self-healing error detection and repair

active.name: Runtime Future Layers
active.description: Monitors and activates new layers (5s/30s scan cycles)
active.note: Browser limitations prevent true file system scanning

active.name: Core Runtime Bootstrap
active.description: Initializes the global runtime environment, lifecycle, state, and error boundaries.

active.name: Runtime Orchestrator
active.description: Orchestrates the dynamic loading of all platform layers, resolving dependencies and enforcing lifecycle hooks.

active.name: Layer Manifest & Dependency Graph
active.description: Defines the machine-readable layer manifest, validates integrity, and maintains the dependency graph.

active.name: Runtime Event Bus & Communication Layer
active.description: Global event bus enabling communication between all system layers with pub/sub patterns, async/sync events, and debugging hooks.

active.name: Pages & Navigation Runtime
active.description: Dynamic navigation system with page routing, active state management, responsive menu handling, and smooth scrolling.

active.name: Media & Assets Runtime
active.description: Lazy loading, responsive media management, and dynamic asset injection system with Intersection Observer.

active.name: SEO & Metadata Runtime
active.description: Dynamic SEO management with meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter Cards, structured data, and canonical URLs.

active.name: Data Fetching & API Integration Runtime
active.description: Centralized API client for all HTTP requests with retry logic, caching, authentication, error normalization, and GraphQL support.
features: REST API support (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE)

active.name: State Management & Data Store Runtime
active.description: Centralized reactive state management with persistence, transactions, undo/redo, computed values, and event-driven updates.

active.name: Security & Performance Runtime
active.description: Security hardening with CSP, XSS/CSRF protection, rate limiting, clickjacking prevention, and comprehensive performance monitoring.

active.name: Multi-Language & Localization Runtime
active.description: Dynamic language switching, RTL support, translation management, and locale-aware date/number/currency formatting.
features: 8 supported languages (EN, ES, FR, DE, AR, PT, ZH, JA)

active.name: CMS & Content Management Runtime
active.description: Complete CMS for creating, editing, deleting articles, categories, and media management with auto-save drafts.

active.name: RSS Aggregation & Auto Content Runtime
active.description: RSS feed aggregation, auto-fetch content, intelligent category mapping, and automatic content distribution.

active.name: Enterprise Global Advertising Engine
active.description: Enterprise-grade Adsterra yield optimizer, format orchestrator, and rotation controller.

configOnly.name: Design System (Layer 0)

configOnly.note: Implemented via CSS, not a JS layer

configOnly.name: Layer 3
configOnly.description: Documentation exists but no runtime implementation

configOnly.name: Media Layer (Layer 6)
configOnly.description: JSON config exists, managed by runtime-media-engine.js

configOnly.name: SEO Layer (Layer 7)
configOnly.description: SEO configs exist, requires manual integration into HTML <head>

configOnly.name: Multi-Language (Layer 11)
configOnly.description: Full language configs ready for implementation

configOnly.name: Monetization (Layer 16)
configOnly.description: Configs exist, managed by ad-engine.js and runtime-ads-scripts.js

primary.role: Master orchestrator for all runtime engines

alternative.role: Alternative master orchestrator - USE ONLY ONE
alternative.note: Will be activated but may conflict with main.js

notes.browserLimitations: Runtime engines cannot truly scan file systems due to browser security. All layers must be explicitly loaded via <script> tags or fetch() calls.
notes.recommendedApproach: Use build tools (Webpack, Vite, etc.) to bundle all modules OR explicitly list all dependencies in HTML.
notes.autoActivation: The runtime-future-layers.js can detect dynamically added <script> tags but cannot scan directories.
notes.conflictResolution: Choose either app.js OR main.js as primary orchestrator, not both.
